snippet: The footage of a deadly melee illustrated the difficulty the government has in controlling inmates in its overcrowded and violent prison system.
abstract: Video footage captured during riot in prison in central Mexican state of San Luis Potosi reveals that guards did little to stop inmates from rampaging within prison, which left 13 dead and 65 wounded; jailbreaks, massacres and deadly rioting are common in Mexican prisons, and video has raised questions about way guards in country's overcrowded prisons respond to such events.

byline.original: By PAULINA VILLEGAS and RANDAL C. ARCHIBOLD

lead_paragraph: The footage of a deadly melee illustrated the difficulty the government has in controlling inmates in its overcrowded and violent prison system.

headline.main: Video of Mexican Prison Riot Highlights a Crisis as Elections Near
headline.print_headline: Video of Prison Riot Publicizes a Crisis as National Elections Near in Mexico
